summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; adopting interim controls restricting heliports and helistops to those serving public safety, news gathering and emergency medical care functions; amending Sections 23.47.006, 23.49.046, 23.49.066, 23.49.096, 23.49.122, 23.49.324, 23.50.014, 23.60.092, 23.60.664, 23.60.730, 23.68.014, 24.54.060 of the Seattle Municipal Code for the interim control period.
